jobs.title: Back-end Developer
jobs.description:
Develop the new services along with maintenance the current services. Eg: getting the requirement, investigation, create solution, development, guarantee quality and deployment. You can do anything to make sure the service run well.
Can involve to R&D new technologies.
responsibilities: Compile and analyze data, processes, and codes to troubleshoot problems and identify areas for improvement
Collaborating with the front-end developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive codes to enhance the user experience
Developing ideas for new programs, products, or features by monitoring industry developments and trends
Participating in continuing education and training to remain current on best practices, learn new programming languages, and better assist other team members
benefits: Work in dynamic & creative environment. We're eager to learn & apply new technology
15 days annual leaves, working Monday - Friday
qualifications: In-depth knowledge about data structures and algorithms
Understand software design principles SOLID, DRY, KISS
Experience about MySQL, PostgreSQL. Know how to writing SQL efficient
Experience Node.js. Plus point: Golang, PHP

jobs.title: Front-end Developer
jobs.description:
Develop the new services along with maintenance the current services. Eg: getting the requirement, investigation, create solution, development, guarantee quality and deployment. You can do anything to make sure the service run well.
Can involve to R&D new technologies.
responsibilities: Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
benefits: Work in dynamic & creative environment. We're eager to learn & apply new technology
15 days annual leaves, working Monday - Friday
qualifications: Experience in JS frameworks like jQuery, React, Vue.js
Experience in bundle like Webpack, Parcel
Have design background or experience with UX/UI design or visual design
Experience with responsive and adaptive design
